name: Dig Dog (itch) (laserbrick, Extra Nice)
description:
Arf! Your favourite ball got stolen by that darn mouse. Better dig through the whole yard to get your ball back. But beware of your owner, he seems mad for some reason.

'wasd' to move
'space' to dig
'shift' to run
'e' to bark

And in case you just want to listen to the soundtrack:
